name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Home - To Do List and Bookmarks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart home is the simple solution for your productivity. It brings all your important URL(s) and to do list in one place!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smarthome is a quick solution to boost your productivity by keeping your todos and bookmarks on a single page!
It allows you to backup your valuable settings, todos, and bookmarks and to sync them across multiple devices!
